item.title: Report X-2024040116
item.description:
Report X-2024040116

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-28
  • City: BOZRAH
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE LEAKED ON BY OTHER PACKAGE. DURING DAMAGE INSPECTION IT WAS NOTED THAT PACKAGE CONTAINED 8 AEROSOL CANS WITHOUT ANY OUTER PKG MARKINGS TO INDICATE PACKAGE CONTAINED AEROSOL CANS
